items.title: Lock canonical plan-as-code entrypoints

items.acceptance_criteria: AGENT_START_HERE and AGENT_MAP link to docs/planning/PROGRAM_PLAN.md and docs/planning/NEXT_ACTIONS.json

items.title: Define manual preflight checklist (NO_GATES window)
items.next_action: Add a minimal manual preflight checklist in docs/planning/INDEX.md and ensure AGENT_MAP points to it (no CI gates during window)
items.acceptance_criteria: docs/planning/INDEX.md contains a manual preflight checklist; docs/agent/AGENT_MAP.md points to it; NEXT_ACTIONS contains no gate-command references (NO_GATES window)

items.title: Finalize ISA Core Contract (6 capabilities + non-scope)
items.next_action: Edit docs/core/ISA_CORE_CONTRACT.md to lock the 6 core capabilities, explicit non-scope, and expected entrypoints placeholders; ensure AGENT_MAP references it
items.acceptance_criteria: ISA_CORE_CONTRACT lists 6 capabilities and explicit non-scope; referenced from docs/agent/AGENT_MAP.md; gates pass

items.title: Create minimal specs for all 6 core capabilities
items.next_action: Create docs/spec/INDEX.md plus 6 minimal specs (ASK_ISA, NEWS_HUB, KNOWLEDGE_BASE, CATALOG, ESRS_MAPPING, ADVISORY) and link them from INDEX and AGENT_MAP
items.acceptance_criteria: Each spec exists, includes inputs/outputs and acceptance criteria; all are linked from docs/spec/INDEX.md and docs/agent/AGENT_MAP.md; gates pass
